resources.string:
XClipper monitors your clipboard and makes an extensive use of it.


It also provide certain actions according to the data.


With suggestion overlay, you can easily paste from multiple clipboards.

Accessibility,


You need to turn on "accessibility" service for this app.


This is due to a restriction imposed by Google which does not allow long running background tasks.


This service will keep running in background capturing your clipboard data.

Suggestions [BETA],


Get a small bubble whenever keyboard pops out containing all your clips.


Enable it from App Settings > General > Suggestions.

Android 10+ user,


Sometimes standard copy doesn't work, in such case use "XCopy".

Android 10+ user,


Sometimes copy action is not detected, in such case use "Save Clip" feature.

Synchronization,


The application works best with it's Windows desktop app.


It allows you to synchronize clipboard data across devices.


Visit https://kaustubhpatange.github.io/XClipper/docs for more info.

Wrapping up,


Watch video to understand full feature usage of application.


https://youtube.com

Android 10+ user,


Due to new introduced privacy changes clipboard monitoring has stopped working from Android 10.


Find more info about this issue on issue tracker https://issuetracker.google.com/issues/123461156


But through some hacks (not perfect one) we can enable it using an accessibility service.


This feature is still in BETA!
